amendment.description: Amendment removes a breakwater in Stonington, Connecticut as a federally authorized project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Courtney.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
